objects.questionsdb10ff019c5avalue: What makes that such an important issue to you?
objects.responsesdb10ff019c5a: The deficit; solve it by merging city departments. Example: Animal Services should be in the Zoo. Public Works should be in DWP.
objects.questionsf6d5d1c2d738value: Under which category does that issue fall?
objects.responses9200af1a79cb: Consolidate city departments to save lots of money
objects.questions9200af1a79cbvalue: If you could tell L.A.'s next mayor to resolve one issue, what would it be?

objects.questionsdb10ff019c5avalue: What makes that such an important issue to you?
objects.responsesdb10ff019c5a: It promotes healthy living standards And a clean city and walkable streets are the face of a great city.
objects.questionsf6d5d1c2d738value: Under which category does that issue fall?
objects.responses9200af1a79cb: Clean up the city. Looks more like a pig's pen than a world class city! And fix the sidewalks.
objects.questions9200af1a79cbvalue: If you could tell L.A.'s next mayor to resolve one issue, what would it be?

objects.questionsdb10ff019c5avalue: What makes that such an important issue to you?
objects.responsesdb10ff019c5a: Has a direct, negative effect on my life every day. Traffic is MUCH worse, and it now takes me twice as long to get everywhere I need to go.
objects.questionsf6d5d1c2d738value: Under which category does that issue fall?
objects.responses9200af1a79cb: Get rid of the Metro Express Lanes on the 110 and 10 freeways
objects.questions9200af1a79cbvalue: If you could tell L.A.'s next mayor to resolve one issue, what would it be?

objects.questionsdb10ff019c5avalue: What makes that such an important issue to you?
objects.responsesdb10ff019c5a: If we could fund greenroofs, & not tax  until re-sold, it would secure our city via clean air, save millions of our cost of water shed, and provide food. Our health and safety are #1.
objects.questionsf6d5d1c2d738value: Under which category does that issue fall?
objects.responses9200af1a79cb: Green roofs
objects.questions9200af1a79cbvalue: If you could tell L.A.'s next mayor to resolve one issue, what would it be?

objects.questionsdb10ff019c5avalue: What makes that such an important issue to you?
objects.responsesdb10ff019c5a: All of our lawmakers act as if they are able to negate the laws of physics. You have to have income to have outflow. 2 + 2 does not equal a Trillion dollars. Stop spending!!! This is a Public Health issue, because when the money is all spent, you can't supply services that are needed.
objects.questionsf6d5d1c2d738value: Under which category does that issue fall?
objects.responses9200af1a79cb: SPENDING TOO MUCH MONEY !!!
objects.questions9200af1a79cbvalue: If you could tell L.A.'s next mayor to resolve one issue, what would it be?

objects.questionsdb10ff019c5avalue: What makes that such an important issue to you?
objects.responsesdb10ff019c5a: No more than any driving Angeleno !
objects.questionsf6d5d1c2d738value: Under which category does that issue fall?
objects.responses9200af1a79cb: More public transportation, incl. a subway that reaches LAX
objects.questions9200af1a79cbvalue: If you could tell L.A.'s next mayor to resolve one issue, what would it be?

objects.questionsdb10ff019c5avalue: What makes that such an important issue to you?
objects.responsesdb10ff019c5a: some third-world countries, where customers pay much less, have faster internet connection than los angeles.  having fast reliable cheap internet access is important to our future.  without more competition, we will never get better internet for cheaper.  most of LA is captive to a single cable provider for rather mediocre Internet connectivity.  (verizon has stopped building FIOS and DSL is awful.)  somewhat related, wireless connectivity and 4G LTE coverage on the westside is poor, too.  Verizon is acceptable, but it is almost the only viable vendor here, too.  please auction off an additional 3 licenses to reach individual houses.  google may be interested---they have done nice fiber in kansas city.
objects.questionsf6d5d1c2d738value: Under which category does that issue fall?
objects.responses9200af1a79cb: Create Competition And Choice Among Cable and Internet Vendors
objects.questions9200af1a79cbvalue: If you could tell L.A.'s next mayor to resolve one issue, what would it be?

objects.responses9200af1a79cb: Funnel as much money as possible to improving public schools and get rid of "For Profit" Schools in Los Angels.

objects.responses9200af1a79cb: Invest more in our public schools.  Every child should be able to obtain a great education from Pre-K through the end of high school, period. Also, provide more funding for free breakfast and lunch programs at LAUSD schools.  Kids whose parents can't afford to provide them with adequate nutrition deserve our support. It takes a village, right?

objects.responses9200af1a79cb: improve public transportation by adding more volume of trains and buses (keep them basic), but don't jack up the prices, its an investment. Work more with the valley, IE, and OC to get a system of metro trains to LA. Most importantly the prices can't be insane (it costs about twice as much to use trains here than in Japan for example).
